basic_info.description_header: Hello, I'm Heather - developer and product designer.
basic_info.description: What excites me most about working in software development is creating an experience that solves real problems. Starting with a deep dive into customer research and creating a vision for a product that will make the lives of our users better. I've spent the last 12 years pushing existing technologies past the boundaries of their intended design. From standing up mobile data centers completely off the grid in a remote desert for military operations to creating custom infrastructure solutions to process $1.36 trillion in total payment volume for a leading fintech company. Pursuing new challenges and curiosities has provided me experience across multiple disciplines. I've held roles in product management, technical project management, communications, organizational design, and strategy development. Now, as a software developer, I'm eager to bring my unique background and problem-solving skills to the development process. I'm loving the opportunity to experience product creation in a new way with a new set of skills but with the same curiosity and willingness to take risks.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
